newLink(String, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Adds a link to a message.
newMediaFromLocal(File, String) - Method in class SNSController
Uploads an image from your local directory to a message.
newMediaFromURL(String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Uploads an image from an online URL.
newMessageAttributes(Map<String, String>, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Adds attributes (keys and corresponding values) to a message.
newMessageFromTemplate(String, Boolean, String, String, boolean, String) - Method in class SNSController
Creates a new message using another message as a template.
newMessageOption(String, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Adds an option to a message.
newPrivateMessage(String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Posts a new message to a specific private topic.
newPrivateTopic(String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Creates a new private topic.
newPublicMessage(String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Posts a new message to a specific public topic.
newPublicTopic(String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Creates a new public topic.
newTopicFromTemplate(String, Boolean, String, boolean, String) - Method in class SNSController
Copies all of the messages (including their attributes and options) from a template topic and posts them to another topic.
newUser(String, String, String, String) - Method in class SNSController
Creates a new user.
